name: TheAtlantic
text: "Understanding why the Chinese Communist Party is acting in such a seemingly self-defeating fashion is now a top question on foreign-policy minds. But perhaps there’s no single right answer," @RHFontaine writes: https://t.co/1CRivtr4F3

name: TheAtlantic
text: Former President Barack Obama spoke during the funeral of Representative John Lewis. Here are his full remarks, from @realcpaz: https://t.co/GWQh3XpHQW

name: TheAtlantic
text: NASA's most sophisticated Mars rover yet has left Earth. Its mission is to find long-dead microbes in the rust-colored soil and package them up to send back home, @marinakoren reports: https://t.co/KMupzhbm3u

name: TheAtlantic
text: Donning masks, congressional lawmakers interrogated big-tech CEOs over videoconference. But all business is tech business now, and the pandemic has only increased technology’s power, writes @ibogost. https://t.co/8GMxu0h0Ps
